title: Longzhu picked up a gold player?
body:
The team Longzhu, apparently picked up a gold player and put him in their lineup?

I want to know if this is true and if it is, what his alias was.

I also got told to trial for some proleague team but I have never heard of anything like this in OCE, so if people could shed some light on all of this that would be helpful.

replies.body:
Korea do not recruit any 1 outside their region. To even be notice, the player has to be in challenger with good reputation. The higher your rank, the better your chances of getting notice. 

OCE, the same could be said about recruiting high rank challenger. There is no way a gold player will be a player on the team. Lack too many game knowledge or cant execute it to win game to climb.

no they don't have any gold players on their roster

by proleague team you mean an opl team? you could probably get in contact with them directly if you wanna tryout i think
odds are the player you're talking about might be a region transfer and got placed gold at the time of registering for Longzhu.

It's a team cohesion thing.

In a full team it's possible that you punch above your individual ranked weight.

So you don't know his alias?

or anything regarding OCE proleague?

I don't really follow the OCE Proleague, and haven't paid a lot of attention to the international scene since S4.

Game mechanics and maths is more my thing.

Worlds rosters are locked in at this stage. So unless it's an emergency sub none of the big teams are bringing players in. As far as I'm aware longzhu haven't brung anyone in since June let alone some unknown golf player
